name: HEATING, AIR-CONDITIONING, & REFRIGERATION DISTRIBUTORS INTERNATIONAL
description: Association representing heating, air-conditioning, & refrigeration distributors
sampleDescriptions:
- Advocacy in support of Working Families Flexibility Act (HR 1180/ S. 801) 
- Advocacy in Support of Strengthening Career and Technical Education for the 21st Century Act (HR 2253)

- Advocacy to clarify products included in expensing of HVAC products

- Advocacy for repeal of the Estate Tax

Advocacy in support of the DRIVE Safe Act (HR 5358)
